channel.title: RageScape Needs A CODER!
channel.description:
Hey guys, I just opened up a server and I need a coding partner to help me. I'm an average coder so I need someone that's really good. I'm not going to let you do most of the work I just need help with certain things. I fixed a lot of stuff on my server but I still need help with some things. If you want to apply just follow this format and I will get back to you.
FORMAT:
Name: Age: Email/Skype: On a scale of 1-10, what would you rate yourself as a coder. (1 as in terrible 10 as in amazing) Coding Experience:
NOTE: Coders get Admin status.
Thanks for reading and please no negative comments :/. I know how the community is nowadays so please try to keep it to yourself thanks.
Sincerely,
Rage

item.title: RageScape Needs A CODER!
item.dc:creator: @RyRyscape RyRyscape
item.description:
@RyRyscape wrote:

Hey guys, I just opened up a server and I need a coding partner to help me. I’m an average coder so I need someone that’s really good.
